title: Another gas shipment sails in: Litro Chairman
body_lines: A freighter carrying 3,900 metric tons of gas sailed into the Colombo Port yesterday and the unloading process is to begin soon, Litro Gas Lanka Limited Chairman Theshara Jayasinghe said.
He said the unloading of the gas began around 7.00 pm yesterday.
"The gas cylinder refilling process is currently underway with around 100,000 gas cylinders could be released to the market per day," he said.
